title: Language Education Design Workshop Utilizing Digital Learning Design Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and practical experience in language education
context.additional_context: Customized online language education design competency enhancement program for current practitioners

learning_goals: Design language education modules by implementing the three-stage learning design process (analysis-design-development) with digital tools
Construct pedagogical activity sequences based on learner analysis results using tools similar to Pedagogical Planner
Verify and improve the feasibility of designed learning modules through project-based assessment

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
